action_title: Use tranquilizers to reduce stress during translocation
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects on mammals of using tranquilizers to reduce stress during translocation. This study was in France.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (1 STUDY)

Survival (1 study): A controlled study in FranceÂ found that using tranquilizers to reduce stress during translocation did not increase post-release survival of European rabbits.

BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
